price: Medyen’e doğru yönelince: “Umarım Rabbim beni doğru yola iletir” dedi.
arabic: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلۡقَآءَ مَدۡيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِي سَوَآءَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walammā tawajjaha til'qāa madyana qāla ʿasā rabbī an yahdiyanī sawāa al-sabīli
